sentences.sentence: Many of the final works contain fugal sections of a very personal nature within sonata forms.
sentences.translation: 许多最后作品在奏鸣曲表格里面非常个人自然包含遁走曲区段。

sentences.sentence: Music Geeks specialize in bands and genres of music never heard of before, such as Swedish fugal opera.
sentences.translation: 这些音乐控通过不同的乐队和音乐体裁来区分自己与其他人，比如什么瑞典诗词歌赋歌剧。

sentences.sentence: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of itraconazloe in treating the invasive fugal infection(IFI) in ICU.
sentences.translation: 评估伊曲康唑治疗ICU中危重患者侵袭性真菌感染（IFI）的疗效及安全性。
